futureBalance.title: Future Balance
futureBalance.subtitle: {{days}}-day projection
futureBalance.notEnoughData: Add more transactions to see projections
futureBalance.needsMonths: We need at least 1 month of data
futureBalance.disclaimer: Based on your spending history, does not include budget limits

info.title: How it's calculated
info.currentBalanceDesc: Sum of all your income minus expenses up to today.
info.weightedAverageDesc: We calculate your average income and expenses from the last 3 months, giving more weight to recent months.
info.weights: Most recent month ×3, previous ×2, 2 months ago ×1
info.scheduledDesc: If you have recurring expenses or income (rent, salary, etc.), they are included based on their frequency.
info.projectionDesc: For each point (30, 60, 90 days) we add estimated income and subtract estimated expenses from your current balance.
info.colorGreen: Green: safe balance (above 20% of your income)

detail.title: Alert detail
detail.alreadyExceededDesc: You have already exceeded this budget limit
detail.exceedingInDesc: At this rate, you'll exceed your budget in {{days}} days
detail.exceedingInDesc_one: At this rate, you'll exceed your budget in {{days}} day
detail.safeDesc: Your budget is on track, no overspending projected
